column5: poor soul is a st..st..STEELERS fan But the creative build was fun. St.Croix 8-6" extended to 9-8"....for chucking 4-12oz. lures..60lb. braid.  miles of thread:      IMG]http://i147.photobucket.com/albums/r314/FrostyQ/rods/steelerswrap.jpg[/img]    inscription done on my Alps printer:
My dad would love a rod like that
